content.title: CM-AVM Syndrome
content.description: Autosomal dominant disorder with capillary malformations and associated arteriovenous malformations

key_concepts.details: Multiple small round/ovoid capillary malformations with pale halos
30% develop fast-flow lesions (brain, spine, soft tissue)
Consider brain/spine MRI in affected individuals

content.clinical_significance: Multiple atypical CMs should prompt genetic testing and AVM screening

primary_sources: Amyere M et al. Nat Genet 2013
